comments: name: name of the skin (directory name: /skins/name)
refreshRate: defines telemetry data refresh rate (ms),
lower values may decrease visible latency,
but may also lead to UI stuttering due to performance problems (especially on Androids).
Please note that refreshRate may be adjusted automatically in case if connection is unstable.
width: width of the skin in pixels (same as defined in the CSS)
height: height of the skin in pixels (same as defined in the CSS)
